name: Campus Connect
description: Developed a MERN application to replace Omnivox for students at Dawson College, offering a suite of features designed to enhance the learning experience. This application includes a real-time chat system utilizing Socket.IO, enabling dynamic room-based interactions for students in common classes. Additionally, it features a shared calendar for efficient event management and enhanced functionalities that foster collaborative learning and seamless communication. Dawson College's course listings and instructor data were scraped for seamless integration into the application, ensuring that students have access to up-to-date information.
